items.content_html: A lightweight tool to monitor your investment portfolio and alert you when its total value crosses defined thresholds.
items.title: vsyerik/PortfolioMonitor: A lightweight tool to monitor your investment portfolio and alert you when its total value crosses defined thresholds.

items.content_html: Fastiscord is a lightweight Discord.js handler that speeds up bot development by automatically loading commands and events from files following a simple naming convention. With built-in CLI support, Fastiscord helps you set up, register, and run your bot effortlessly.
items.title: silvaezequias/fastiscord: Fastiscord is a lightweight Discord.js handler that speeds up bot development by automatically loading commands and events from files following a simple naming convention. With built-in CLI support, Fastiscord helps you set up, register, and run your bot effortlessly.

items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable email warm-up tool built with Node.js and React. It automates sending warm-up emails from a single Gmail account to multiple receivers
items.title: arshisk/email-warmup-tool: A lightweight, customizable email warm-up tool built with Node.js and React. It automates sending warm-up emails from a single Gmail account to multiple receivers

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.
items.title: iamVihanga/Ride-Service-Backend: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
